example.description: Copy a file from web/header to standard out replacing ${DATE} with the date formatted year-month-day 'T' hour:minute:second

code.pre: <io:copy dir="web" file="header" xmlns="edu.bxml.format" xmlns:io='edu.bxml.io'> <replace expression="\$\{DATE\}" replacement="{yyyy-MM-dd}T{HH:mm:ss}" /> </io:copy>

example.note: Replace comes from the edu.bxml.format namespace.
